name: Dice Combat (Skeffles)
description:
Dice Combat is an Arena Action game made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam. You throw dice at enemies and let fate decide what happens. Each enemy you take down will spawn a coin that you can collect. Who can collect the most coins?!

  • Movement - WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Charge Roll - Hold Space
  • Roll - Release Space

Roll two die. One decides the action and the other decides how extreme the action is. These actions can be:

  • Heal the player
  • Damage enemies
  • Instantly kill enemies
  • Duplicate enemies
